name: Marvel Comic Book Collection: X-Men, Volume 1 (2-Disc) (Full Frame)
categoryPath: Movies & TV/TV Shows/Anime & Animation/Anime for Children

reviews.name: Marvel Comic Book Collection: X-Men, Volume 1 (2-Disc) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText:
I give the animated series a full 5/5. It's the quality of the animation though that was the 1st thing I noticed when I started watching it. For having kept this for several years & knowing it would be released on DVD they made no effor to clean or digitally remaster any of it.

Poor Quality
GREAT show!!
reviews.title: Poor Job Cleaning It Up

reviews.name: Marvel Comic Book Collection: X-Men, Volume 1 (2-Disc) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: The first disc wouldn't play on my daughter's dvd player.
reviews.title: 10 March 2010

reviews.name: Marvel Comic Book Collection: X-Men, Volume 1 (2-Disc) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: A lot of people wanted it to be remastered, of course I'd like that too, but I think this dvd was perfectly fine.
reviews.title: Great!

reviews.name: Marvel Comic Book Collection: X-Men, Volume 1 (2-Disc) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: This was SOOOOO great. the theme music alone was worth it. and who doesn't love that old full screen!!
reviews.title: Great for the fans who Remember it

reviews.name: Marvel Comic Book Collection: X-Men, Volume 1 (2-Disc) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: Love the comics? You must have this series!
reviews.title: 10 November 2011
